actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit 401(k) contributions which would otherwise be limited by employer contributions to employee stock ownership plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit employers to make contributions to employees' 401(k) plans regardless of employer contributions to employee stock ownership plans.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit 401(k) contributions which would otherwise be limited by employer contributions to employee stock ownership plans.
